subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Twelve horses have won the Triple Crown, with American Pharoah’s victory in 2015 the most recent. A look back at how The New York Times covered these rare triumphs.
snippet: Twelve horses have won the Triple Crown, with American Pharoah’s victory in 2015 the most recent. A look back at how The New York Times covered these rare triumphs.
